txsscan config¶

class txsscanlib.config.Config(cfg_file='', hmmer_exe=None, e_value_res=None, e_value_sel=None, def_dir=None, res_search_dir=None, res_search_suffix=None, profile_dir=None, profile_suffix=None, res_extract_suffix=None, log_level=None)[source]¶

parse configuration files and handle the configuration according the file location precedence /etc/txsscan.conf < ~/.txsscan.conf < .txsscan.conf if a configuration file is given on the command line, only this file is used. in fine the arguments passed have the highest priority

__init__(cfg_file='', hmmer_exe=None, e_value_res=None, e_value_sel=None, def_dir=None, res_search_dir=None, res_search_suffix=None, profile_dir=None, profile_suffix=None, res_extract_suffix=None, log_level=None)[source]¶
